text: Schelten () is a municipality in the administrative district of Jura bernois in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. This is one of two German speaking cities in the majority French-speaking Bernese Jura (Jura Bernois). The other is Seehof.Historisches Lexikon der Schweiz (HLS), Schwabe AG, Basel, (2002â€“) ==References== Category:Municipalities in Jura bernois
title: Schelten
